question_text: Which of the following methods allows you to insert an Adobe Photoshop Image into your Excel spreadsheet?
choice_1: Go to the insert tab on the ribbon and select object. Choose Adobe Photoshop Image from the box and select Ok
choice_2: Simply drag and drop your Adobe Photoshop image file directly onto the worksheet you want to add it to
choice_3: Microsoft Office is not compatible with Adobe products
choice_4: Select Open from the Office Button. Browse to your image file, select the checkbox labeled Insert into current document and hit open

choice_2: Right click on the worksheet and select insert - entire column
choice_3: Right click on the worksheet tab and select delete
